post.summary: Add a document to the search index
post.description: Add a document to the search index

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: A document ID that is unique to your CMS. It cannot begin with a forward slash. Attempting to create a document with a `document_id` that already exists results in an error.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Document link URL

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Document title

parameters.name: created
parameters.description: When the document was initially created (such as ‘2013-02-27T10:00:00Z’)

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Document description. You must pass either a description or content, and preferably both!

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Document content. . You must pass either a description or content, and preferably both!

parameters.name: promote
parameters.description: Whether to promote the document in the relevance ranking

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Two-letter locale describing language of document (defaults to 'en’)

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of case-insentitive tags
